import React from 'react' import { KTSVG, toAbsoluteUrl } from '_metronic/helpers' import { AccountModel } from 'app/modules/accounts/models/Account' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {actions} from '../../redux/AccountRedux' type Props = { item: AccountModel } const UserItem : React.FC = ({ item }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const clickHandler =()=>{ dispatch(actions.showCurrentAccount(item)) } return (
{item.username} {item.role}
{item.balance}
50%
) } export default UserItem
